name: C/C++ Theme tokyo night storm altsyn
author: khakiakhaki

tokenColors.name: Separators (key/value, namespace, inheritance, pointer, hash, slice, etc)
Generics, templates, and mapped type declarations
Powershell constants mistakenly scoped to `support`, rather than `constant` (edge)
storage built in types: int, float, same with semantic 'type'
function tokens, sometimes ms c/c++ can't recognize all function tokens

semanticTokenColors.TODO: ccpp_comment1: =============`ccpp` customized semantic(ms c/c++ and clangd) tokens=============

type.note: 1/clangd: uint8_t; ms c/c++: clangd type + clangd class/enum

method.static.note: another method token is shared with clangd

property.note: clangd: property.*.classScope, ms c/c++: all non static fields defined inside of class, struct, union
